events.message: We received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate who has strong backend development skills and experience in microservices architecture.
The application was categorized under Engineering due to relevant software development keywords such as engineer and backend mentioned in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles was assigned to this candidate to manage the application and coordinate the interview process.
The recruiter conducted an initial screening call with the candidate to discuss their experience in software engineering and technical skills in detail.
The candidate responded positively to the screening and expressed strong interest in proceeding with the technical interview stage.
The technical interview with the senior engineering team was scheduled for the candidate to assess coding abilities and problem-solving skills.
